entry.title: xsl:stylesheet
entry.summary: The root element of a stylesheet.

entry.title: xsl:declaration
entry.summary: The abstract element for which declaration elements may be substituted.

entry.title: xsl:output
entry.summary: Determines the format of a result document that is written to the output.

entry.title: xsl:attribute-set
entry.summary: Declares a named set of attributes and values.

entry.title: xsl:include
entry.summary: Used to include one stylesheet module within another.

entry.title: xsl:import
entry.summary: Imports a stylesheet module. Differs from xsl:include in that the declarations and rules in the importing stylesheet have a higher import precedence, than those in the imported stylesheet.

entry.title: xsl:import-schema
entry.summary: Declaration, in a schema-aware processor, that identifies a schema defining the user-defined types, element and attributes.

entry.title: xsl:key
entry.summary: Declares a named key to be used with the key() function.

entry.title: xsl:template
entry.summary: The building blocks of XSLT. This element is used to declare a template for generating nodes in a result tree.

entry.title: xsl:call-template
entry.summary: Invokes a named template.

entry.title: xsl:transform
entry.summary: The name is a synonym of xsl:stylesheet.
Determines the display format of a source data number, that has been converted to a string by the XSLT format-number() function.
entry.title: xsl:decimal-format
xsl:character-map
entry.summary: Declares a named character map that determines the way that characters are serialized.

entry.title: xsl:function
entry.summary: Declares the name, parameters, and implementation of a custom stylesheet function.

entry.title: xsl:preserve-space
entry.summary: Specifies the elements in which whitespace in text nodes is significant.

entry.title: xsl:strip-space
entry.summary: Specifies the elements in which whitespace in text nodes is not significant.

entry.title: xsl:instruction
entry.summary: The abstract element for which instruction elements may be substituted.

entry.title: xsl:apply-templates
entry.summary: Defines a set of nodes to process.

entry.title: xsl:apply-imports
entry.summary: Overrides an existing global variable or parameter, or a template rule with one of the same name in an imported module.

entry.title: xsl:attribute
entry.summary: Adds attributes to literal result elements or elements created by an instruction like xsl:element or xsl:copy.

entry.title: xsl:param
entry.summary: Defines a global parameter to a stylesheet, or a local parameter within xsl:template or xsl:function.

entry.title: xsl:with-param
entry.summary: Sets the value of a parameter supplied to a template.

entry.title: xsl:variable
entry.summary: Declares a global or local variable and assigns a value to it.

entry.title: xsl:if
entry.summary: Defines a test condition, and a sequence constructor to perform if the condition evaluates to 'true'.

entry.title: xsl:choose
entry.summary: An instruction that specifies a choice between alternatives, which are defined by multiple xsl:when instructions, and an optional, terminal, xsl:otherwise element.

entry.title: xsl:when
entry.summary: Defines a test condition, and a sequence constructor to perform. At least one element must appear inside xsl:choose.

entry.title: xsl:otherwise
entry.summary: Defines an action to take if none of the preceding xsl:when tests inside xsl:choose are satisfied.

entry.title: xsl:for-each
entry.summary: selects a sequence of items for uniform processing. The items may be either nodes or atomic values.

entry.title: xsl:for-each-group
entry.summary: Selects a sequence of items for uniform processing, and groups them according to common values, adjacency, or in relation to other elements.

entry.title: xsl:sort
entry.summary: A sort key component, any number of which may be combined in a sort specification.

entry.title: xsl:perform-sort
entry.summary: Standalone instruction to sort items without any immediate additional processing.

entry.title: xsl:number
entry.summary: Numbers nodes sequentially, and formats the numbers.

entry.title: xsl:result-document
entry.summary: Creates a new result tree, and optionally associates it with formatting set in xsl:output.

entry.title: xsl:analyze-string
entry.summary: An instruction that processes a string using a regular expression.

entry.title: xsl:matching-substring
entry.summary: Defines the processing for a match within the xsl:analyze-string instruction.

entry.title: xsl:non-matching-substring
entry.summary: Defines the processing for a substrings that are not matched within the xsl:analyze-string instruction.

entry.title: xsl:output-character
entry.summary: Defines the substitution of a single Unicode character within an xsl:character-map declaration.

entry.title: xsl:comment
entry.summary: Creates a comment node.

entry.title: xsl:copy
entry.summary: Copies the context item to the result sequence.

entry.title: xsl:copy-of
entry.summary: Copies a sequence of nodes to the result sequence.
Creates a document node and adds it to the result sequence.
entry.title: xsl:document
xsl:element
entry.summary: Creates a named element node and writes it to the result tree.

entry.title: xsl:fallback
entry.summary: Defines fallback behavior when there is no implementation of a containing instruction.

entry.title: xsl:next-match
entry.summary: Allows more than one rule to apply to the same source node, within the same stylesheet module.

entry.title: xsl:message
entry.summary: Specifies a message to be output.

entry.title: xsl:namespace
entry.summary: Creates a named namespace node and writes it to the result tree.

entry.title: xsl:namespace-alias
entry.summary: Declares a namespace from a stylesheet to be associated with a different namespace in the output.

entry.title: xsl:processing-instruction
entry.summary: An instruction that outputs a processing instruction node.

entry.title: xsl:sequence
entry.summary: An instruction that is commonly used to return the result of a stylesheet function.

entry.title: xsl:text
entry.summary: Adds literal text to the result sequence.
Adds a text node to the result sequence.
entry.title: xsl:value-of
Generic element attributes
entry.summary: Generic element attributes, which may be expressed on any XSLT or literal result elements.

entry.title: Version attributes
entry.summary: The version attribute, typically used on the xsl:stylesheet element. It may be used on XSLT instructions, literal result elements and some declarations.

entry.title: Validation attributes
entry.summary: Validation attributes on elements.

entry.title: current
entry.summary: Returns the current context item

entry.title: current-group
entry.summary: Returns the sequence of items in the current group within an xsl:for-each-group instruction

entry.title: current-grouping-key
entry.summary: Returns the value of the group-by or group-adjacent expression for the group being processed with an xsl:for-each-group instruction. There is no key when grouping by patterns.

entry.title: document
entry.summary: Returns the document node of the XML document located at the URI provided in the href argument

entry.title: element-available
entry.summary: Returns true if a named XSLT instruction is available for use.

entry.title: format-number
entry.summary: Formats numbers for display using a picture string.

entry.title: format-date, format-dateTime, format-time
entry.summary: Three functions that format date and time values.

entry.title: function-available
entry.summary: Returns true if a named XSLT, user-defined or extension function is available for use.

entry.title: generate-id
entry.summary: Generates an XML Name that uniquely identifies a node.

entry.title: key
entry.summary: Returns the nodes with a given value for a named key, which was defined using the xsl:key declaration.

entry.title: regex-group
entry.summary: Identifies an ordered substring returned as part of a regular expression obtained from matching with xsl:analyze-string.

entry.title: system-property
entry.summary: Returns details about the current processor in a string containing the value of a named environment property.

entry.title: type-available
entry.summary: Tests if a given schema type is available.

entry.title: unparsed-entity-public-id, unparsed-entity-uri
entry.summary: Two functions that access the public and system identifiers of parsed entities in the DTD of a source document.

entry.title: unparsed-text, unparsed-text-available
entry.summary: Two functions that test for the existence of a text file, and load it for processing.
